Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Death
    describes the deaath with its parameters killercolor, deadcolor, overkill
    GameController
    defines the gamecontroller chich includes the definition of the map, the gamemode, the initial timer, the ammocard deck, the weapon card deck, the powerupcard deck, the remaining skulls, the deaths , the round manager, the last final frenzy player and the match
    GameData
    Includes all the data of the current game
    Match
    Defines the current match , which has a state, a gamecontroller, a list of gamecolor, a list of players, a random value and an identificator
    MatchData
    containes all the data of the current match
    MatchManager
    implements the manager of the match
    RoundManager
    Manages the round indicated by its players, an index, and index the player and a number for the round
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CanceledActionException.Cause  
    Match.State  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CanceledActionException
    expcetion when an action is deleted.
    StartGameWithoutPlayerException
    exception launched when the game starts without players
    TimeOutException
    exception launched when the time is over
    TooManyPlayerException
    exception launched when the game starts with too many players
